1.name: NRITYA
1.descr:
Let your life dance on the edges of time like dews on the tip of leaf...
It's time to use your dancing skills to amaze people around you..

Think of the magic of that foot ,shout your ideas through your moves,express yourselves and dance like nobody's watching.
Pump up your adrenaline and prepare yourselves for NRITYA, inter-college dance competition.#Never miss a chance to dance....
rules: Registration fee : Rs 1500 per team
Each team should consist of minimum of 7 members
Performance time should not exceed than 10 minutes
Anything that can ruin stage is not allowed to use
Teams should report the stage 1 hour prior to the event
Registration is mandatory
Participants must be students

2.name: STAR OF RITU
2.descr:
When you shine as bright as a star, when you remove darkness from your path,you becomes a real star.
Presenting before you, the hunt to find the ultimate master of charm, grace and charisma,
STAR OF RITU
If you are a crowd puller, if you believe you are special, we give you a chance to showcase your skills and become the real star.
Come,explore and showcase the best in you by being a part of STAR OF RITU because we will make you do your best!
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 200
There will be a preliminary round and onstage round.
Participants can chose either English or Malayalam as medium of communication.
Decision of the judges will be final.
Participants should stick on to the instructions of the coordinators.

3.name: EXODUS
3.descr:
The arena is all set for the ultimate war of sophisticated machines.
Where the wheels get tangled, where the fittest get survived, where there is no place for empathy…
Get ready for the most exciting and ultimate war to bring up your machine that can survive till the end, with strength, power and speed. Speed up your wheels for war of the bots.
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 500 per team
Final decisions will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

4.name: TALAASH
4.descr:
Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.
Hidden amidst these lands are treasure for the ones who search with not just their eyes and ears but with the most essential wit.
Put your wits to use and dig out RIT's hidden treasure, start out on a Talaash of glory.
Tighten your shoes to grab all what you need to be the winner.
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 400 per team
Each team should consist of four members.
Prelims will be held for shortlisting the participant teams.
No switching of team members will be permitted after the hunt begins.
Final decisions will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

5.name: VOICE OF RITU
5.descr:
Music speaks what cannot be expressed.
It soothes the mind and gives it rest, heals heart and makes it whole, flows from heaven to the soul.
A great singing voice is not something that can be taught, it is a gift very few people are born with.
Are you among the lucky few?
Here, Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Kottayam gives you a platform to showcase your skills in Ritu'18

Hit the right note to win the battle.
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 100 per head
There will be 4 rounds:

First Round : Audition | There will be an audition based on the number of participants. Participants can perform any song of thier choice with karaoke. Song can be Malayalam,Hindi or Tamil (Max time allotted:4min). Only 5 participants will progress to next round.

Second Round : Evergreen Malayalam Melody | participants should perform any song in Malayalam with karaoke.The karaoke must be clean and voice suppressed tracks are not allowed. (Time allotted:6 minutes).
Third Round : Performance Round | Participants must perform a fast song in Malayalam/Tamil/Hindi. Karaoke needed. (Max time allotted: 7min). 2 participants will be eliminated after 3rd round.
Final Round : The final Participants must save thier best performance for the last round. They can perform any song of thier choice in Malayalam/Tamil/Hindi(Max time:6min).
Final judgement will be purely based on the overall singing and performance .
Final decisions will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

6.name: ROTODRAG
6.descr:
Drift through the even sky and look through the eagle's eye.
Push your rotoring skills to the limit, cut through the winds, dash like a swallow to make your drone the ultimate aero.
Maneuver your drones to show your piloting skills.
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 550 per team
Maximum frame size allowed is 80x80cm
RTF(ready to fly),FPVs,Navigation,Altitude Hold aspects are strictly prohibited.
A team can have maximum of 5 members.

Contest comprises of two rounds:
Round 1: Pilot the drone from circle A to Circle B. (NB:not an elimination round)
Round 2: Maneuver the drone through obstacle course.
Points will be awarded according to the task completed.
Final decisions will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

7.name: COUNTY CRICKET LEAGUE
7.descr: It's the time to show your county skills. Sometimes it's not about the big hits,placement becomes the challenge
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 500 per team
Maximum 5 players in a team.
Scoring area is restricted to offside.
3 over game per side.
Each bowler can bowl 1 over.
Bowlers are allowed to bowl inside a box.
Umpires decision will be final.
Other rules are as per BCCI.

8.name: COLOSSEUM
8.descr:
Do you call yourself a GAMER?
Have you got what it takes to enter the battlefield and TAKE DOWN your enemies?
Come prove yourself, the COLOSSEUM waits you at RITU'18.Counter Strike GO :
Prize - 8k(1st) + 4k(2nd)
Entry fee - 500 per team

NFS Most Wanted :
Prize - 2.5k(1st) + 1.5k(2nd)
Entry fee - 50 per head

FIFA :
Prize - 2.5k(1st) + 1.5k(2nd)
Entry fee - 100 per head
rules: Final decisions will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

9.name: AERO SHOW
9.descr:
Its only when you're flying above it that you realise how incredible the earth really is.
So get a chance to view everyone from above and see with a new perspective.
Presenting before you Swift but charming drones just for your amazement.
So lift your heads up and watch the magic of these flying demons in the sky

10.name: AQUA STRIKE
10.descr:
Your mission should you choose to accept it...is to build an unrivalled water rocket that can survive the trials because when it comes down to the seas, only the smartest fish survive.
Speed, Range, Accuracy, you've got to excel in them all.
rules: Registration Fee: Rs 150
A team can have upto 3 members
The rocket body should be made only with plastic bottles of maximum capacity 2.25L and must be single stage.
Bring 2 rockets which can withstand multiple crashes.
Launcher and pump will be provided.
There will be a two round matchup
1. Max range
2. Bullseye Bombing

1.name: RAPID MINER
1.descr:
Do you have the flair to make a computer dance to your tunes? Do you want to prove to the world that you're worth your salt ? We offer you the ultimate challenge.
Fight your way up the four different rounds and be crowned as the conqueror of the world of zeroes and ones.
rules: Registration Fee : ₹200
Individual Participation
Decision of event heads will be final

2.name: THE VINCI CODE
2.descr:
Crack the code and the Ultimate Treasure is all yours!!! If you have the master brain to break the glass, to crack the cryptos, to mine and uncover the jewels on your way...
If you are quick enough to seize the clues and sharp enough to unveil the concealed hints...
Then here is your chance....
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100 per team
Each team can have upto 2 persons
Decision of event heads will be final

3.name: CODE WARS
3.descr:
Eons have passed since the Death Star succeeded in spreading fear in the universe.
To curb the rising tensions, the jedi have risen once again. With the mouse sabre in your hand, do you think you've got what it takes to beat the Dark Side of the code? Join us at Code Wars 18' and get a chance to code your way to glory!
Rs.7000 worth of prizes up for grabs..........but that's nothing compared to what you can do once you've mastered the code!
Face off against the Darth Vader of bugs and code to restore peace to the Universe. and most importantly,..........Destroy the Emperor of errors!
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100
Individual participation
Decision of event heads will be final

4.descr:
Does the world of 'dot-coms' fascinate you enough to weave your own webbie sphere?
If yes, here's your chance..The ultimate web design and development competition.
Come up the hill and prove your mettle!!
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100
Individual participation
Decision of event heads will be final

5.name: Googlr
5.descr:
Of all the species that walk on Earth, curiosity was always man's forte. Whenever there's something hidden, you always feel the urge to find it. And this time, you are equipped with the ultimate weapon ever forged at your disposal. That moment when you realize that an omniscient entity will lead you to the ultimate prize.
Yes, Google is your haystack !
But the big question is.... Can you find the needle??
rules: Registration Fee : ₹50
Individual participation
Decision of event heads will be final

5.name: ELECTROCUTION
5.descr:
Age is never a matter in gaming. We become aged when we stop playing. Nothing becomes complete with a touch of fun, and that too with the electronics.
Enter to the world of games.
rules: Electrocution is a series of games built with electronic circuits which win the participant points.
The  points are accumulated and the one with the maximum point wins.
Winners are declared for each day.
Individual participations
Decision of event heads will be final

4.name: IC WAR
4.descr:
Connect the possibilities and be the IC King..
lf you have the spark of innovation in you..
If you got in yourself the confidence to handle those miniature arachnids..,
This is the call for you..
Come join the battle and win the war with the talent you got and fight with the skill you have..
Move those arms and connect the circuits...
Manifest your knowledge of basic IC's , your skill to assemble them, and the logic to debug them..
Explore the wonderous world of the 8 legged IC's..Lead them to the battle field and win the crown..
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100 per team
A team can have upto 2 members
Decision of event heads will be final

3.name: SELL ME THE CIRCUIT
3.descr:
BUY..SELL...BORROW
Buy low and sell high..its simple
Are you skilled at digital circuits? Are you a good trader ?Then grab your seat and get ready to show your skill in building digital circuits and trading.
Crack the prilims and certain your seats ..Build the circuits..borrow or buy at cost of points..sell to gain more...
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100 per team
A team can have upto 2 members
The team with greater points  wins
Decision of event heads will be final

1.name: LAB HUNT
1.descr:
So you think you mastered the art of deduction..?

Do you have the wit beyond textbooks, the brains to see through facades, and the stamina to go on a restless quest..?

Tease your brain, set those feet on motion and prove your scavenging skills here at LAB HUNT

The dept of ECE is back again with yet another crazy adventure marathon where you get to push your technical, thinking, puzzle solving skills off the limits and experience the adrenaline rush..!!

Look for the clues on places no one ever expects...unlock and explore the labs, solve the puzzles, have fun and complete the challenges that would ultimately lead to the treasure you're seeking.

Let us see who could put forward the best team work and patience..
rules: Registration Fee : ₹200 per team
A team can have upto 4 members
Decision of event heads will be final

2.name: LINE FOLLOWER
2.descr:
Are your hands nimble and your minds sharp?
Can you work them in tandem and make the ultimate LINE FOLLOWER to lead you victory?

Then buckle up and start putting together your line follower.
Race your creation through an exciting maze of obstacles and see if it holds up to the truly remarkable standards of engineering perfection to leave your competitors in the dust.
Those of you who are ready to test your creativity, to tinker and tweak your designs to make the greatest LINE FOLLOWER that can clear the most intricate tracks,
Department of Eʟᴇᴄᴛʀᴏɴɪᴄs ᴀɴᴅ Cᴏᴍᴍᴜɴɪᴄᴀᴛɪᴏɴ beckons you to put your innovations to test with the Line Follower challenge.
rules: Registration Fee : ₹50 per team
A team can have upto 2 members
Decision of event heads will be final

3.name: MACHINE DEBUGGING
3.descr:
Progress is made by the improvement of people and not machines...
Have you ever envied your error debugging skills, then definitely this is the platform for you. The department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering in association with RITU'18 provides you an excellent arena to compete with the best minds out there.
rules: Reg fee 300/-
Groups of 2 or 3 can participate.
There will be two rounds of evaluation
Evaluation will be strictly based on reasoning, analysis and neatness

4.name: MAZE RUNNER
4.descr:
If you can run,then you are a runner. It doesn't matter how far or how fast
An Electrical department treasure hunt. Brush up just your basics and be there for RITU'18 on March 1 because Where's the fun if all events are for techies.
rules: A team of 2 with their Google guru is all we want.

1.name: MAESTRO
1.descr:
Have you ever thought about the true purpose of an engineer? Engineers are creators, people who believe they can change the world.
Bring out The Best Electrical Engineer in you!!!
Compete with the sharpest minds and you will be the one to bag the prize.
rules: Decision of the event head will be final

2.name: IDEATOR
2.descr:
Paper presentation
Lighten up your master minds!!! Creativity is thinking up new things. Innovation is doing new things. The Dept. Of EEE Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology,Kottayam in association with Ritu 18 provides you with the perfect opportunity to showcase your skills through Paper Presentation
rules: Registration fee Rs 150/- per head
The team should have not more than 2 members.
Maximum time for presentation- 10 minutes and 5 minutes for questions and answers
Students who want to participate are requested to contact the coordinators.
The abstract(in pdf or Microsoft word document format) should be sent to ideatorritu18@gmail.com on or before 24-feb-18.
The presentation should be in Microsoft PowerPoint

5.name: CAD MASTER
5.descr:
Drawing is Thinking Made Visual.
The Dept of EEE, Govt. RIT Kottayam in association with RITU'18 provides an excellent opportunity to showcase your technical drawing skills. CAD MASTER test you for engineering design abilities, imagination and technical drawing skills.
rules: The drawing should be completed only using AutoCAD.
Time for drawing - 2.30 hrs
Evaluation will be based on precision, neatness, and logical usage of given data.
Venue: Software Lab, Dept of EEE | Time: 9.30 am
Creative inclusions to the drawing will be considered for evaluation

5.name: THE CONCRETE QUEST
5.descr: This year's Ritu brings you an interesting challenge with concrete. Design a concrete mix  for a characteristic compressive strength of 30 N /mm2 and 100 mm slump.
rules: Registration fee: Rs. 100 per team
4 Members per team
Participants should use IS method for designing the mix
Cube will be tested for 7 day compressive strength

1.name: PERUNTHACHAN
1.descr: Are you the one who can outshine with your exceptional talents in diverse areas of civil engineering? Ritu brings the perfect platform for all those aspiring civil engineers, PERUNTHACHAN. Be that team which can excel in technical, managerial and logical skills through wide spectra of contests.
rules: Each team should consist of 3 to 4 members.
Prelims will be held for shortlisting the participant teams.
No switching of team members will be permitted.
Event will be carried out in different levels to test technical, managerial and logical skills.
Final decision will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

2.name: ENCUEASTA
2.descr: May your angle be right and compass be true. The perfect chance to showcase your surveying skills. Its all about being the fastest and the sharpest. Survey your way through the rounds and unlock the treasure! The better you think, the better you find.
rules: Registration fee: Rs 150 per team
Each team should consist of 3 to 4 members.
Prelims will be held for shortlisting the participant teams.
No switching of team members will be permitted after the hunt begins.
Completion of surveying task is compulsory for the progress.
Final decision will be taken by the event co-ordinators.

3.name: ANTHROPOMETRIST
3.descr: Should we engineers ourselves depend on machines and electronic gadgets when we have this enormous power of observation.Govt. RIT Kottayam presents Anthropometrist  as part of RITU'18 .Show us your talent to measure by visual inspection and observation. Let this be the stage to unleash your skills.
rules: 2 members per team
All participants should be engineering students
Marks will be given based on accuracy of measurements

4.name: TANTRADNYA
4.descr: Do you have a spark, something that is hidden deep inside your creative mind, that has the power to reform innovate and revolutionize the techno world? Come On…hurry up…jot them down make it a paper and present…For RITU is offering you a platform as an event TANTRADNYA ,to be a phoenix… Rise from your ashes, make the spark in to a fire: A fire that will guide the future technical world.
rules: For team paper Rs: 150, for individual paper Rs: 100
Both individual and team work can be presented.
If a team, only one among the team can present the paper.
All paper should have sound technical basis.

1.name: ENGINE ASSEMBLY
1.descr:
Good at revving up engines ??
Ever tried to assemble one ?
Because you never know your vehicle if you don't know it's soul.
Turbo power your skills and assemble from bolt to throttle...
rules: Registration Fee : ₹150
Individual Participation
Decision of event heads will be final

2.name: JUNK MASTER
2.descr:
Ever imagined waste as a resource...?
Are you a person with insane ideas..!
Then we are giving you the space & time to transform your ideas to creative models...
It is simple, very simple.
You do not need to be perfect.
Imperfection is beauty.
You just need to be better....
Do whatever your heart tells...!!
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100
Participation in either a group of two or one
Junk Master is a time bound programme which gives you 90 minutes to show your talents.
You could use all the scraps available to you .
Winners will be selected on the basis of neatness of work and workplace, aesthetics and closeness with the theme.
Fastners , welding opportunities & scrap will be provided.
Final decisions will be taken by the event coordinators

3.name: MACHINIST
3.descr:
Recognition awaits for your precision.

So turn on the machinist inside you and face the chance to be the best in the business.
rules: Registration Fee : ₹100
Individual Participation
Final decisions will be taken by the event coordinators

4.name: NUMERA UNO
4.descr:
Ideas of today shape the reality of tomorrow.
Let the world know of your brilliance as we provide you the ample platform to realize your ideas.
No matter how lunatic it may seem, an idea works only when you believe. So bring out your crazy genius as they say 'Change doesn't come on its own , it is brought'
Theme : Technologies that optimize
rules: Registration fee : ₹100
Time : 10:30am
Venue : Department of Mechanical Engineering
Maximum members per team is restricted to 3
Each team would be given 10 mins for presentation and 5 mins for Q&A
Team must sent the abstract under 300 words in word format to the email numero_unoritu@yahoo.com before 24 FEB. Team must bring three copies of the abstract on the day of presentation.
Score will be based on credibility of the concept, communication skill, simplicity and scope , in given order.
The decision of the judges will be final.

5.name: GUNS N' ROSES
5.descr:
This Ritu invoke the inventor in you , where creativity is the game.
Your ability to design and fabricate from an inventory of materials given to you , a working prototype of the subject , is what stands between you and that 7k cash prize.
rules: Registration fee : Rs 150 per team
A preliminary round consisting an aptitude test of 30 questions answerable in 30 minutes will be held, and the first 10  teams will be screened into the finals.
In the final round each team will have to fabricate a working prototype of the subject given to them.

Exhaustive testing of the prototype will be done in a competitive basis and points will be awarded for the overall design , minimum material wastage and miscellaneous parameters of the prototype which will be declared in the final round.
A team can have upto 4 members
All the materials required for the event shall be provided by the organisers
Decision of the judges will be final.

2.name: TRANSFORM
2.descr: Fashion is a statement, an art of personal self expression. The style you bring speaks of who you are. So inhold the magic and execute a masterpiece.
rules: 3 members in a team ( 1 model and 2 for designing ) .
Materials will be provided .
Tools ( like scissors, cutterblades , fevicol etc ) can be brought by the participants.
Rampwalk section will be judged by the judges .
Judges decision will be final .
Registration Fee- Rs 100

6.name: PUTHIYAMUKHAM
6.descr: Its time to bring the drama on the face . Hold the power in your hand and execute the theatrically. Bring out the expression .... ! Let them exude through the face .
rules: 2 persons per team.
Topic will be given at the time of event.
Paint will be provided. No other paints should be used other than the given .
Brushes should be brought by the participants.
Judges decision will be final .
Registration Fee- Rs 10

3.name: SRISHTI
3.descr: All those who long for their vision to come true, prepare to create. Design a product with ideal function and good aesthetic. Prove your metal with your timeless product.
rules: 2 members in a team .
Sheets will be provided.
Registration Fee- Rs 20

4.name: FRUIT CARVING
4.descr: The sight of a fruit always refresh us. Carving a design out of it would enhance the effect. So cut the fruit and take the prize.
rules: 2 members in a team.
Tools should be brought by the participants.
Watermelon will be provided and the participants should make use of it fully.
Registration Fee- Rs 30

5.name: PAPER TOWER
5.descr: Crafting with paper has always been a exciting and learning art. Towers are always majestic and gives everything around it beauty. So get high and reach the sky with your paper tower.
rules: 2 members in a team.
Team should bring tools for cutting.
Material will be provided.
The final structure should be stable and self standing.
Registration Fee- Rs 10

1.name: WALL PAYATTU
1.descr: Why creeping through grey scales when your hand is full of colors ??? Scratch the walls, colour it bright, and grab your seat, among the creators of the best season.
rules: 4 members maximum in a team.
Topic will be given at the time of event.
Paint will be provided. No other paints should be used other than the given .
Brushes will be provided.
Judges decision will be final .
Registration Fee- Rs 300

3.name: BOOT ME
3.descr:
Innovate-Ignite-Inspire
Are you a tech wizard?
Do you think you can smash it out!
Join us......!!!
Be ready to hunt your knowledge on OS Installation. Exuberance,Spontenity and Passion,the key to crack it. Invites you to explore your implicit ideas and ignite your concrete core.
#Act_now #Ack_fast #Reboot_your_potential.
rules: Use of any electronic devices  are not allowed
Winner is the one who satisfies the maximum requirements at minimum time
The decision of the judges will be final in the events
There will be two rounds PRELIMS and FINALS
Registration Fee- Rs 100
Venue: Software Lab, MCA dept

1.name: DBASE
1.descr: This event deals with database aspects. This event analyses your knowledge in the database and also summarize how much you are comfort with database connectivity.
rules: Regsitration Fee- Rs 200
The event will be for individuals.
The event will have held in 3 rounds.
All round are carried out in machines.
Round 1: General Test- A test is conducted for measures the knowledge in the database concepts.
Round 2: Query Test- A query test for writing the SQL queries for desired outputs.
Round 3: Connectivity Test- A participant has to do database connectivity using a latest programming language.
Venue: MCA LAB

2.name: DESIGN PRO
2.descr:
Nail out the software design from the requirements.
Construct the software flow and data flow diagrams, build the database efficiently within the time limit and present your design. Let your brain work twice, because here’s the dept of MCA, as part of RITU ’18, presenting before you.
rules: Registration Fee- Rs 200
Team of two is allowed
Maximum Duration :  6 hrs
No external devices or mobile phones are allowed.
Most efficient and simple design logic will be selected as the best
The event comprises of four levels :Aptitude Test , Requirement Analysis , Design ,Presentation
Venue- Software Lab, MCA dept

4.name: FIX ME BUDDY
4.descr:
Are u a master in hardware?
Do u think u can meet the hazards in hardware and emerge as a winner.if u have the faith in u as a hardware master.let u skill be awakend at the venue of Fix me buddy conducted by the mca department.
rules: The event will be for Solo Ones.
Maximum Duration 2hrs.
No external devices or mobile phones are allowed.
The event would be a rapov of 3 levels.
Registration Fee- Rs 300
Venue : Software Lab, MCA dept

5.name: RUSH HOUR
5.descr:
Have you got the talent?
Do you have a spirit of a performer?
Be ready to find you.Its the time to explore your skills.
Here is for you RUSH HOUR with variety of tasks.Show your talents in an hour.
rules: Registration fee Rs 100/-
Preliminary Level  will be conducted.
Individual participation.
There is no any time consideration will be given after the time limit.
No external device or mobile phones are allowed.
Venue: Project Lab, MCA Dept

1.name: OPPURTUNITY HACKATHON
1.descr:
The biggest reason why people don’t get into Y Combinator is because they don’t apply
- Sam Altman

Missing out on scholarships and events like Jagriti yathra just because you are confused with the procedures for applying?
Well fret not! We have got just the thing for you!

Ritu2k18 in association with Tinkerhub-RIT, proudly presents, Opportunity Hackathon, a one of a kind event, to fix all your scholarship woes.
Join us, as mentors from various fields break down to you the hacks of creating an impressive application and completing the various procedures required.

Choose one of the below opportunities :
  • YSI global challenge
  • Outreachy internships
  • Google summer of code
  • Harvard advanced leadership initiative (10th coherent)
  • Celestini project India 2018
  • Social alpha energy challenge
rules: Registration Fee: Absolutely nothing
Venue: Rit, Kottayam(CS Dept)
Participants must be students

2.name: ANDROID DEV WORKSHOP
2.descr:
Still downloading apps from Play Store?
It's time to build your own and upload them on the Android Play Store.

TinkerHub-RIT presents you a workshop on Android Development as part of RITU'18. The workshop will provide you with a basic knowledge of Java, Android Studio, and Database Querying. This will leave you capable enough to build your own app. So be there and don't miss this chance to get into your journey of being an app developer.
rules: Registration Fee : Rs 400

3.name: DEEP LEARNING
3.descr:
Every day brings us new headlines for how Deep Learning is changing the world around us.
Diagnosing skin cancer, the brain power of Amazon Go, driverless cars...
Deep learning has made its mark in all.

Want to know what this fuss is about?
TinkerHub-RIT presents before you an introductory workshop on Deep Learning using Keras as part of RITU'18. The workshop provides a basic foundation, giving an overview of many concepts and techniques. Do not miss this golden opportunity to understand the mysteries of deep learning.
rules: Registration Fee : Rs 400
